attributes.action: Put Clinical waste bags in every household
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a community carer, I have noticed that there are yellow bags in some of my service users homes, however, not in all. I know that people in their own homes are still putting sanitary towels, tampons, pads, in toilets and in black bins. Even in my own home. I would like to see a yellow bag put in every home, especially as if these are burnt, it will not cause toilet blockage and lessen the waste put in rubbish tips.
